verses.verse: I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes <S%H5869><s%> again, and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> with a measuring <S%H4060><s%> line <S%H2256><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Where <S%H575><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> you? And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, To measure <S%H4058><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, and what <S%H4100><s%> is the length <S%H753><s%> thereof.

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me went <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> angel <S%H4397><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7125><s%> him,

And said <S%H559><s%> to him, Run, <S%H7323><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to this <S%H1975><s%> young <S%H5288><s%> man, saying, <S%H559><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> as towns <S%H6519><s%> without walls for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and cattle <S%H929><s%> therein: <S%H8432><s%>

For I, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> will be to her a wall <S%H2346><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, and will be the glory <S%H3519><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of her.

Ho, <S%H1945><s%> ho, <S%H1945><s%> come forth, and flee <S%H5127><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for I have spread <S%H6566><s%> you abroad <S%H6566><s%> as the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Deliver <S%H4422><s%> yourself, O Zion, <S%H6726><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> with the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> After <S%H310><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> has he sent <S%H7971><s%> me to the nations <S%H1471><s%> which spoiled <S%H7997><s%> you: for he that touches <S%H5060><s%> you touches <S%H5060><s%> the apple <S%H892><s%> of his eye. <S%H5869><s%>

For, behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will shake <S%H5130><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> on them, and they shall be a spoil <S%H7998><s%> to their servants: <S%H5647><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> and rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> for, see, I come, <S%H935><s%> and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> and shall be my people: <S%H5971><s%> and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you, and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> his portion <S%H2506><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> land, <S%H127><s%> and shall choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> again. <S%H5750><s%>

Be silent, <S%H2013><s%> O all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for he is raised <S%H5782><s%> up out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation. <S%H4583><s%>
